title: Entity Instance
description: Represents a specific, unique occurrence of an entity within the game world. It links to a definition and specifies only the unique properties or changes for that particular instance.

$schema.description: Optional. A URI reference to the schema that this document conforms to, enabling editor validation and autocompletion.

instanceId.description: Required. The unique, namespaced identifier for this specific entity instance (e.g., 'world:player_character', 'dungeon1:goblin_sentry_01'). This ID must be unique across all instances in a loaded game world.

definitionId.description: Required. The namespaced ID of the entity definition that this instance is based on.

componentOverrides.description: Optional. An object map of components that override the defaults from the referenced definition. If a component is listed here, its data completely replaces the corresponding component data from the definition for this instance only.

propertyNames.description: Component keys must be valid namespaced IDs referencing the component type to be overridden.

additionalProperties.description: The overriding data for a component. The structure must match the schema for that component type.
